wikipedia_page.main: John Blair Balfour, 1st Baron Kinross  (11 July 1837 – 22 January 1905) was a Scottish lawyer and Liberal politician who sat in the House of Commons from 1880 to 1899.

response: *John Balfour, 1st Baron Kinross, Lord Justice General of Scotland 1899–1905; Lord Advocate 1881–85, 1886 & 1892–95; Solicitor General for Scotland 1880–1; Liberal MP 1880–99
* John Balfour, 1st Baron Kinross (1837–1905), Scottish lawyer and politician
* John Balfour, 1st Baron Kinross (1837–1905), British politician
